alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:56PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pima, west central Cochise and northeastern Santa Cruz Counties through 245 PM MST... At 156 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Huachuca City, or 12 miles northwest of Sierra Vista, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Benson, Whetstone, Huachuca City, Elgin, Kartchner Caverns State Park, Fort Huachuca, Mescal, Fairbank, Charleston and Canelo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 289 and 305. Route 80 between mile markers 295 and 296. Route 82 between mile markers 38 and 61. Route 83 near mile marker 14. Route 90 between mile markers 290 and 317. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
